00034    /*
00035    * Constructor.
00036    */
00037    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00038    Simulation::Simulation(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00039     : nSystem_(1),
00040       speciesManagerPtr_(0),
00041       diagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00042       communicatorPtr_(&communicator),
00043       nAtomType_(-1),
00044       nBondType_(-1),
00045       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00046       nAngleType_(-1),
00047       #endif
00048       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00049       nDihedralType_(-1),
00050       #endif
00051       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00052       nLinkType_(-1),
00053       #endif
00054       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00055       hasExternal_(-1),
00056       #endif
00057       #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00058       hasTether_(-1),
00059       #endif
00060       atomCapacity_(0),
00061       bondCapacity_(0),
00062       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00063       angleCapacity_(0),
00064       #endif
00065       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00066       dihedralCapacity_(0),
00067       #endif
00068       maskedPairPolicy_(MaskBonded)
00069    {
00070       Util::initStatic();
00071       Atom::initStatic();
00072       Diagnostic::initStatic();
00073 
00074       if (!MPI::Is_initialized()) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("MPI not initialized on entry");
00076       }
00077       commitMpiTypes();
00078 
00079       // Set directory Id in FileMaster to MPI processor rank.
00080       fileMaster_.setDirectoryId(communicatorPtr_->Get_rank());
00081 
00082       // Set log file for processor n to a new file named "n/log"
00083       // Relies on initialization of FileMaster outputPrefix to "" (empty).
00084       fileMaster_.openOutputFile("log", logFile_);
00085       Log::setFile(logFile_);
00086 
00087       speciesManagerPtr_ = new SpeciesManager;
00088    }
00089    #endif
00090 
00091    /*
00092    * Constructor.
00093    */
00094    Simulation::Simulation()
00095     : nSystem_(1),
00096       speciesManagerPtr_(0),
00097       diagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00098       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00099       communicatorPtr_(0),
00100       #endif
00101       nAtomType_(-1),
00102       nBondType_(-1),
00103       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00104       nAngleType_(-1),
00105       #endif
00106       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00107       nDihedralType_(-1),
00108       #endif
00109       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00110       nLinkType_(-1),
00111       #endif
00112       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00113       hasExternal_(-1),
00114       #endif
00115       #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00116       hasTether_(-1),
00117       #endif
00118       atomCapacity_(0),
00119       bondCapacity_(0),
00120       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00121       angleCapacity_(0),
00122       #endif
00123       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00124       dihedralCapacity_(0),
00125       #endif
00126       maskedPairPolicy_(MaskBonded)
00127    {
00128       Util::initStatic();
00129       Atom::initStatic();
00130       Diagnostic::initStatic();
00131       speciesManagerPtr_ = new SpeciesManager;
00132    }
00133 
00134    /*
00135    * Destructor.
00136    */
00137    Simulation::~Simulation()
00138    {
00139       if (speciesManagerPtr_) {
00140          delete speciesManagerPtr_;
00141       }
00142 
00143       Atom::deallocate();
00144 
00145       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00146       if (logFile_.is_open()) logFile_.close();
00147       #endif
00148    }

00150    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00151    /*
00152    * Set an MPI job to read a single parameter file, from std::cin.
00153    */
00154    void Simulation::setParamCommunicator(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00155    {
00156       if (communicatorPtr_ == 0) {
00157          UTIL_THROW("No communicator was passed to constructor");
00158       } else 
00159       if (communicatorPtr_ != &communicator) {
00160          UTIL_THROW("ParamCcommunicator must be the one passed to constructor");
00161       }
00162       fileMaster_.setParamFileStdIn();
00163       ParamComponent::setParamCommunicator(communicator);
00164    }
00165 
00166    /*
00167    * Set an MPI job to read a single parameter file, from std::cin.
00168    */
00169    void Simulation::setParamCommunicator()
00170    {  Simulation::setParamCommunicator(*communicatorPtr_); }
00171    #endif
00172 
00173    /*
00174    * Read parameter file.
00175    */
00176    void Simulation::readParam(std::istream& in)
00177    {
00178 
00179       // Preconditions
00180       assert(speciesManagerPtr_);
00181 
00182       readParamComposite(in, fileMaster_);
00183 
00184       read<int>(in, "nAtomType", nAtomType_);
00185       if (nAtomType_ <= 0) {
00186          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType must be > 0");
00187       }
00188 
00189       read<int>(in, "nBondType", nBondType_);
00190       if (nBondType_ <= 0) {
00191          UTIL_THROW("nBondType must be > 0");
00192       }
00193       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00194       read<int>(in, "nAngleType", nAngleType_);
00195       if (nAngleType_ < 0) {
00196          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType must be >= 0");
00197       }
00198       #endif
00199       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00200       read<int>(in, "nDihedralType", nDihedralType_);
00201       if (nDihedralType_ < 0) {
00202          UTIL_THROW("nDihedralType must be >= 0");
00203       }
00204       #endif
00205       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00206       read<int>(in, "nLinkType", nLinkType_);
00207       if (nLinkType_ < 0) {
00208          UTIL_THROW("nLinkType must be >= 0");
00209       }
00210       #endif
00211 
00212       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00213       read<int>(in, "hasExternal", hasExternal_);
00214       if (hasExternal_ < 0) {
00215          UTIL_THROW("hasExternal must be >= 0");
00216       }
00217       #endif
00218       #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00219       read<int>(in, "hasTether", hasTether_);
00220       if (hasTether_ < 0) {
00221          UTIL_THROW("hasTether must be >= 0");
00222       }
00223       #endif
00224 
00225 
00226       #ifndef MCMD_NOATOMTYPES
00227       // Allocate and read an array of AtomType objects
00228       atomTypes_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00229       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00230          atomTypes_[i].setId(i);
00231       }
00232       readDArray<AtomType>(in, "atomTypes", atomTypes_, nAtomType_);
00233       #endif
00234 
00235       read<MaskPolicy>(in, "maskedPairPolicy", maskedPairPolicy_);
00236 
00237       readParamComposite(in, *speciesManagerPtr_);
00238       readParamComposite(in, random_);
00239 
00240       // Allocate and initialize all private arrays.
00241       initialize();
00242 
00243    }
00244 
00245    /*
00246    * Allocate and initialize all private data (private method).
00247    *
00248    * Allocates global arrays (molecules_, atoms_, bonds_, angles_) and the
00249    * arrays first<class>Ids_ of integers to species blocks. Initializes:
00250    *
00251    *   - Capacity values and first<class>Ptr_ addresses.
00252    *   - Integer ids for Species and Molecule objects.
00253    *   - Pointers between Species, Molecule, and Atom objects
00254    *   - Atom typeIds and all Bond and Angle objects.
00255    */
00256    void Simulation::initialize()
00257    {
00258 
00259       //Preconditions
00260       assert(nSpecies() > 0);
00261       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00262       assert(nAngleType_ >= 0);
00263       #endif
00264       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00265       assert(nDihedralType_ >= 0);
00266       #endif
00267       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00268       assert(nLinkType_ >= 0);
00269       #endif
00270 
00271       Species *speciesPtr;
00272       int  nAtom, nBond, iSpecies;
00273       int capacity;
00274       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00275       int  nAngle;
00276       #endif
00277       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00278       int  nDihedral;
00279       #endif
00280 
00281       // Allocate arrays of pointers to first object in a species block.
00282       firstMoleculeIds_.allocate(nSpecies());
00283       firstAtomIds_.allocate(nSpecies());
00284       if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00285          firstBondIds_.allocate(nSpecies());
00286       }
00287       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00288       if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00289          firstAngleIds_.allocate(nSpecies());
00290       }
00291       #endif
00292       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00293       if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00294          firstDihedralIds_.allocate(nSpecies());
00295       }
00296       #endif
00297 
00298       // Count Molecules, Atoms and Groups.
00299       moleculeCapacity_ = 0;
00300       atomCapacity_     = 0;
00301       bondCapacity_     = 0;
00302       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00303       angleCapacity_    = 0;
00304       #endif
00305       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00306       dihedralCapacity_  = 0;
00307       #endif
00308       for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00309          speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00310 
00311          // Set id for Species object
00312          speciesPtr->setId(iSpecies);
00313 
00314          // Set indexes of first objects of the blocks for this species
00315          firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies] = moleculeCapacity_;
00316          firstAtomIds_[iSpecies] = atomCapacity_;
00317          if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00318             firstBondIds_[iSpecies] = bondCapacity_;
00319          }
00320          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00321          if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00322             firstAngleIds_[iSpecies] = angleCapacity_;
00323          }
00324          #endif
00325          #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00326          if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00327             firstDihedralIds_[iSpecies] = dihedralCapacity_;
00328          }
00329          #endif
00330 
00331          // Increment total capacity values
00332          capacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00333          nAtom = speciesPtr->nAtom();
00334          moleculeCapacity_ += capacity;
00335          atomCapacity_ += capacity*nAtom;
00336          if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00337             nBond    = speciesPtr->nBond();
00338             bondCapacity_ += capacity*nBond;
00339          }
00340          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00341          if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00342             nAngle = speciesPtr->nAngle();
00343             angleCapacity_ += capacity*nAngle;
00344          }
00345          #endif
00346          #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00347          if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00348             nDihedral = speciesPtr->nDihedral();
00349             dihedralCapacity_ += capacity*nDihedral;
00350          }
00351          #endif
00352       }
00353 
00354       // Allocate global array of atoms (static member of Atom class).
00355       Atom::allocate(atomCapacity_, atoms_);
00356 
00357       // Allocate other global arrays (members of Simulation).
00358       molecules_.allocate(moleculeCapacity_);
00359 
00360       // Initialize all Atoms and Groups
00361       for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00362          speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00363          initializeSpecies(iSpecies);
00364       }
00365 
00366       // Initialize bonds.
00367       if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00368          if (bondCapacity_ > 0) {
00369             bonds_.allocate(bondCapacity_);
00370          } else {
00371             bonds_.allocate(1);
00372          }
00373          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00374             initializeSpeciesBonds(iSpecies);
00375          }
00376       }
00377 
00378       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00379       if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00380          if (angleCapacity_ > 0) {
00381             angles_.allocate(angleCapacity_);
00382          } else {
00383             angles_.allocate(1);
00384          }
00385          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00386             initializeSpeciesAngles(iSpecies);
00387          }
00388       }
00389       #endif
00390 
00391       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00392       if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00393          if (dihedralCapacity_ > 0) {
00394             dihedrals_.allocate(dihedralCapacity_);
00395          } else {
00396             dihedrals_.allocate(1);
00397          }
00398          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00399             initializeSpeciesDihedrals(iSpecies);
00400          }
00401       }
00402       #endif
00403 
00404    }
00405 
00406    /*
00407    * Initialize all Molecule and Atom objects for one Species (private).
00408    *
00409    * This function creates associations between Species, Molecule, and
00410    * Atom objects for all molecules of one species, and sets atom typeIds.
00411    * For each molecule, it sets id, species, nAtom, and firstAtom.
00412    * For each atom, it sets the molecule and typeId.
00413    *
00414    * This method also pushes all molecules of the species onto the
00415    * reservoir.
00416    */
00417    void Simulation::initializeSpecies(int iSpecies)
00418    {
00419 
00420       Species*  speciesPtr;
00421       Molecule* moleculePtr;
00422       Atom*     atomPtr;
00423       int       iMol, iAtom;
00424       int       capacity, nAtom;
00425 
00426       speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00427       capacity   = speciesPtr->capacity();
00428       nAtom      = speciesPtr->nAtom();
00429 
00430       // Initialize pointers before loop
00431       moleculePtr = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies]];
00432       atomPtr     = &atoms_[firstAtomIds_[iSpecies]];
00433 
00434       // Loop over all molecules in Species
00435       for (iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00436 
00437          // Initialize a Molecule
00438          moleculePtr->setId(iMol);
00439          moleculePtr->setSpecies(*speciesPtr);
00440          moleculePtr->setNAtom(nAtom);
00441          moleculePtr->setFirstAtom(*atomPtr);
00442 
00443          // Loop over atoms in a molecule, set molecule and atom TypeId
00444          for (iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom; ++iAtom) {
00445             atomPtr->setMolecule(*moleculePtr);
00446             atomPtr->setTypeId(speciesPtr->atomTypeId(iAtom));
00447             ++atomPtr;
00448          }
00449 
00450          ++moleculePtr;
00451       }
00452 
00453       // Push all molecules of this species onto the reservoir stack
00454       // Push on in reverse order, so that they pop off in sequence
00455       moleculePtr = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies] + capacity - 1];
00456       for (iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00457          speciesPtr->reservoir().push(*moleculePtr);
00458          --moleculePtr;
00459       }
00460 
00461    }
00462 
00463    /*
00464    * Initialize all Bond objects for Molecules of one Species. (private)
00465    *
00466    * This functions assigns pointers to Atoms and bond types ids within a
00467    * contiguous block of Bond objects, and sets a pointer in each Molecule
00468    * to the first Bond in the associated block.
00469    */
00470    void Simulation::initializeSpeciesBonds(int iSpecies)
00471    {
00472       if (nBondType_ <= 0) {
00473          UTIL_THROW("nBondType_ must be positive");
00474       }
00475 
00476       Species*  speciesPtr = 0;
00477       Molecule* moleculePtr = 0;
00478       Bond*     bondPtr = 0;
00479       Atom*     firstAtomPtr;
00480       Atom*     atom0Ptr;
00481       Atom*     atom1Ptr;
00482       int       iMol, iBond, atom0Id, atom1Id, type;
00483       int       capacity, nBond;
00484 
00485       speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00486       nBond      = speciesPtr->nBond();
00487       capacity   = speciesPtr->capacity();
00488 
00489       // Initialize pointers before loop
00490       moleculePtr = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies]];
00491       bondPtr = &bonds_[firstBondIds_[iSpecies]];
00492 
00493       // Loop over molecules in Species
00494       for (iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00495 
00496          firstAtomPtr = &(moleculePtr->atom(0));
00497          moleculePtr->setFirstBond(*bondPtr);
00498          moleculePtr->setNBond(nBond);
00499 
00500          if (nBond > 0) {
00501 
00502             // Create bonds for a molecule
00503             for (iBond = 0; iBond < nBond; ++iBond) {
00504 
00505                // Get pointers to bonded atoms and bond type
00506                atom0Id  = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).atomId(0);
00507                atom1Id  = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).atomId(1);
00508                type     = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).typeId();
00509                atom0Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom0Id;
00510                atom1Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom1Id;
00511 
00512                // Set fields of the Bond object
00513                bondPtr->setAtom(0, *atom0Ptr);
00514                bondPtr->setAtom(1, *atom1Ptr);
00515                bondPtr->setTypeId(type);
00516 
00517                // If MaskBonded, add each bonded atom to its partners Mask
00518                if (maskedPairPolicy_ == MaskBonded) {
00519                   atom0Ptr->mask().append(*atom1Ptr);
00520                   atom1Ptr->mask().append(*atom0Ptr);
00521                }
00522 
00523                ++bondPtr;
00524             }
00525 
00526          }
00527          ++moleculePtr;
00528       }
00529 
00530    }
00531 
00532    #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00533    /*
00534    * Initialize all Angle objects for Molecules of one Species.
00535    *
00536    * This functions assigns pointers to Atoms and angle types ids within a
00537    * contiguous block of Angle objects, and sets a pointer in each Molecule
00538    * to the first Angle in the associated block.
00539    */
00540    void Simulation::initializeSpeciesAngles(int iSpecies)
00541    {
00542 
00543       if (nAngleType_ <= 0) {
00544          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType must be positive");
00545       }
00546 
00547       Species*  speciesPtr = 0;
00548       Molecule *moleculePtr = 0;
00549       Angle    *anglePtr = 0;
00550       Atom     *firstAtomPtr, *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr, *atom2Ptr;
00551       int       iMol, iAngle, atom0Id, atom1Id, atom2Id, type;
00552       int       capacity, nAngle;
00553 
00554       speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00555       capacity   = speciesPtr->capacity();
00556       nAngle     = speciesPtr->nAngle();
00557 
00558       // Initialize pointers before loop
00559       moleculePtr = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies]];
00560       anglePtr = &angles_[firstAngleIds_[iSpecies]];
00561 
00562       // Loop over molecules in Species
00563       for (iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00564 
00565          firstAtomPtr = &(moleculePtr->atom(0));
00566          moleculePtr->setFirstAngle(*anglePtr);
00567          moleculePtr->setNAngle(nAngle);
00568 
00569          if (nAngle > 0) {
00570 
00571             // Create angles for a molecule
00572             for (iAngle = 0; iAngle < nAngle; ++iAngle) {
00573 
00574                // Get pointers to atoms spanning the angle and angle type
00575                atom0Id  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(0);
00576                atom1Id  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(1);
00577                atom2Id  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(2);
00578                type     = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).typeId();
00579                atom0Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom0Id;
00580                atom1Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom1Id;
00581                atom2Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom2Id;
00582 
00583                // Set fields of the Angle object
00584                anglePtr->setAtom(0, *atom0Ptr);
00585                anglePtr->setAtom(1, *atom1Ptr);
00586                anglePtr->setAtom(2, *atom2Ptr);
00587                anglePtr->setTypeId(type);
00588 
00589                ++anglePtr;
00590 
00591             }
00592 
00593          }
00594 
00595          ++moleculePtr;
00596       }
00597 
00598    }
00599    #endif
00600 
00601    #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00602    /*
00603    * Initialize all Dihedral objects for Molecules of one Species.
00604    *
00605    * This functions assigns pointers to Atoms and Dihedral types ids within
00606    * a contiguous block of Dihedral objects, and sets a pointer in each 
00607    * Molecule to the first Dihedral in the associated block.
00608    */
00609    void Simulation::initializeSpeciesDihedrals(int iSpecies)
00610    {
00611 
00612       Species*  speciesPtr = 0;
00613       Molecule *moleculePtr = 0;
00614       Dihedral  *dihedralPtr = 0;
00615       Atom     *firstAtomPtr, *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr, *atom2Ptr, *atom3Ptr;
00616       int       iMol, iDihedral, atom0Id, atom1Id, atom2Id, atom3Id, type;
00617       int       capacity, nDihedral;
00618 
00619       speciesPtr = &species(iSpecies);
00620       capacity   = speciesPtr->capacity();
00621       nDihedral  = speciesPtr->nDihedral();
00622 
00623       // Initialize pointers before loop
00624       moleculePtr = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[iSpecies]];
00625       dihedralPtr = &dihedrals_[firstDihedralIds_[iSpecies]];
00626 
00627       // Loop over molecules in Species
00628       for (iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00629 
00630          firstAtomPtr = &(moleculePtr->atom(0));
00631          moleculePtr->setFirstDihedral(*dihedralPtr);
00632          moleculePtr->setNDihedral(nDihedral);
00633 
00634          if (nDihedral > 0) {
00635 
00636             // Create dihedrals for a molecule
00637             for (iDihedral = 0; iDihedral < nDihedral; ++iDihedral) {
00638 
00639                // Get local indices for atoms and dihedral type
00640                atom0Id  = speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).atomId(0);
00641                atom1Id  = speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).atomId(1);
00642                atom2Id  = speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).atomId(2);
00643                atom3Id  = speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).atomId(3);
00644                type     = speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).typeId();
00645 
00646                // Calculate atom pointers
00647                atom0Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom0Id;
00648                atom1Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom1Id;
00649                atom2Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom2Id;
00650                atom3Ptr = firstAtomPtr + atom3Id;
00651 
00652                // Set fields of the Dihedral object
00653                dihedralPtr->setAtom(0, *atom0Ptr);
00654                dihedralPtr->setAtom(1, *atom1Ptr);
00655                dihedralPtr->setAtom(2, *atom2Ptr);
00656                dihedralPtr->setAtom(3, *atom3Ptr);
00657                dihedralPtr->setTypeId(type);
00658 
00659                ++dihedralPtr;
00660             }
00661          }
00662          ++moleculePtr;
00663       }
00664 
00665    }
00666    #endif
00667 
00668    /*
00669    * Associate and allocate a System MoleculeSet for a specified Species.
00670    */
00671    void Simulation::allocateMoleculeSet(Util::ArraySet<Molecule>& set, 
00672                                         int speciesId) const
00673    {
00674       const Molecule* molecules = &molecules_[firstMoleculeIds_[speciesId]];
00675       int   capacity = species(speciesId).capacity();
00676       set.allocate(molecules, capacity);
00677    }
00678 
00679    // Accessors
00680 
00681    /*
00682    * Get number of Species in this Simulation.
00683    */
00684    int Simulation::nSpecies() const
00685    {  return speciesManagerPtr_->size(); }
00686 
00687    /*
00688    * Get a reference to a Species object, identified by index.
00689    */
00690    Species& Simulation::species(int i)
00691    {  return (*speciesManagerPtr_)[i]; }
00692 
00693    /*
00694    * Get a const reference to a Species object, identified by index.
00695    */
00696    const Species& Simulation::species(int i) const
00697    {  return (*speciesManagerPtr_)[i]; }
00698 
00699    /*
00700    * Return true if valid, or throw an Exception.
00701    */
00702    bool Simulation::isValid() const
00703    {
00704       // Check indices of all Atom objects
00705       for (int iAtom = 0; iAtom < atomCapacity_; ++iAtom) {
00706          if (atoms_[iAtom].id() != iAtom) {
00707             UTIL_THROW("Error in atom Ids");
00708          }
00709       }
00710 
00711       // Check validity of all Species objects.
00712       for (int iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00713          species(iSpecies).isValid();
00714       }
00715 
00716       // Declare and initialize pointers to atoms, bonds, etc.
00717       const Atom* atomPtr = &(atoms_[0]);
00718       const Bond* bondPtr = 0;
00719       if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00720          bondPtr = &(bonds_[0]);
00721       }
00722       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00723       const Angle* anglePtr = 0;
00724       if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00725          anglePtr = &(angles_[0]);
00726       }
00727       #endif
00728       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00729       const Dihedral* dihedralPtr = 0;
00730       if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00731           dihedralPtr  = &(dihedrals_[0]);
00732       }
00733       #endif
00734       const Molecule* moleculePtr = &(atomPtr->molecule());
00735 
00736       // Loop over molecular species
00737       for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00738 
00739          // Declare / initialize variables for this Species
00740          const Species*  speciesPtr = &(species(iSpecies));
00741          const int capacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00742          const int nAtom = speciesPtr->nAtom();
00743          int nBond = 0;
00744          if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00745             nBond = speciesPtr->nBond();
00746          }
00747          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00748          int nAngle = 0;
00749          if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00750             nAngle = speciesPtr->nAngle();
00751          }
00752          #endif
00753          #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00754          int nDihedral = 0;
00755          if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00756             nDihedral = speciesPtr->nDihedral();
00757          }
00758          #endif
00759 
00760          // Loop over molecules allocated for a species
00761          for (int iMol = 0; iMol < capacity; ++iMol) {
00762 
00763             // Validate molecule
00764             if (&moleculePtr->species() != speciesPtr) {
00765                UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent molecule.species()");
00766             }
00767             if (moleculePtr->id() != iMol) {
00768                UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent molecule.id()");
00769             }
00770 
00771             // Validate atoms within a molecule
00772             {
00773                if (&moleculePtr->atom(0) != atomPtr) {
00774                   UTIL_THROW("Error in molecule::bond()");
00775                }
00776 
00777                int  type;
00778                for (int iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom; ++iAtom) {
00779    
00780                   // Validate pointers linking atom and molecule
00781                   if (&(atomPtr->molecule()) != moleculePtr) {
00782                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom.molecule()");
00783                   }
00784                   if (atomPtr != &(moleculePtr->atom(iAtom))) {
00785                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent molecule.atom()");
00786                   }
00787    
00788                   // Validate atom type, if species is not mutable
00789                   if (!speciesPtr->isMutable()) {
00790                      type = atomPtr->typeId();
00791                      if (type < 0 || type >= nAtomType_) {
00792                         UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom type id");
00793                      }
00794                      if (type != speciesPtr->atomTypeId(iAtom)) {
00795                         UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom type");
00796                      }
00797                   }
00798 
00799                   ++atomPtr;
00800                }
00801             }
00802 
00803             if (nBondType_ > 0) {
00804 
00805                if (&moleculePtr->bond(0) != bondPtr) {
00806                   UTIL_THROW("Error in molecule::bond()");
00807                }
00808 
00809                const Atom* atom0Ptr;
00810                const Atom* atom1Ptr;
00811                int id0, id1, bondType;
00812 
00813                // Validate bonds within a molecule
00814                for (int iBond = 0; iBond < nBond; ++iBond) {
00815 
00816                   // Get data from associated SpeciesBond
00817                   id0 = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).atomId(0);
00818                   id1 = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).atomId(1);
00819                   bondType = speciesPtr->speciesBond(iBond).typeId();
00820 
00821                   // Validate SpeciesBond
00822                   if (id0 < 0 || id0 >= nAtom) {
00823                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesBond");
00824                   }
00825                   if (id1 < 0 || id1 >= nAtom) {
00826                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesBond");
00827                   }
00828                   if (bondType < 0 || bondType >= nBondType_) {
00829                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesBond");
00830                   }
00831 
00832                   // Validate consistency of Bond and SpeciesBond
00833                   atom0Ptr = &(bondPtr->atom(0));
00834                   atom1Ptr = &(bondPtr->atom(1));
00835                   if (atom0Ptr != &(moleculePtr->atom(id0))) {
00836                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for a Bond");
00837                   }
00838                   if (atom1Ptr != &(moleculePtr->atom(id1))) {
00839                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for a Bond");
00840                   }
00841                   if (bondPtr->typeId() != bondType) {
00842                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent bond type index");
00843                   }
00844 
00845                   // If MaskBonded, check that bonded atoms are masked
00846                   if (maskedPairPolicy_ == MaskBonded) {
00847 
00848                      if (!atom0Ptr->mask().isMasked(*atom1Ptr)) {
00849                         UTIL_THROW("Missing masked partner");
00850                      }
00851                      if (!atom1Ptr->mask().isMasked(*atom0Ptr)) {
00852                         UTIL_THROW("Missing masked partner");
00853                      }
00854 
00855                   }
00856 
00857                   ++bondPtr;
00858                }
00859             }
00860 
00861             #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00862             if (nAngleType_ > 0) {
00863 
00864                if (&moleculePtr->angle(0) != anglePtr) {
00865                   UTIL_THROW("Error in molecule::angle()");
00866                }
00867 
00868                const Atom* atom0Ptr = 0;
00869                const Atom* atom1Ptr = 0;
00870                const Atom* atom2Ptr = 0;
00871                int id0, id1, id2, angleType;
00872 
00873                // Validate angles within a molecule
00874                for (int iAngle = 0; iAngle < nAngle; ++iAngle) {
00875 
00876                   // Get data from associated SpeciesAngle
00877                   id0  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(0);
00878                   id1  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(1);
00879                   id2  = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).atomId(2);
00880                   angleType = speciesPtr->speciesAngle(iAngle).typeId();
00881 
00882                   // Validate SpeciesAngle object
00883                   if (id0 < 0 || id0 >= nAtom) {
00884                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesAngle");
00885                   }
00886                   if (id1 < 0 || id1 >= nAtom) {
00887                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesAngle");
00888                   }
00889                   if (id2 < 0 || id2 >= nAtom) {
00890                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesAngle");
00891                   }
00892                   if (angleType < 0 || angleType >= nAngleType_) {
00893                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesAngle");
00894                   }
00895 
00896                   // Validate consistency of Angle and SpeciesAngle
00897                   atom0Ptr = &(anglePtr->atom(0));
00898                   atom1Ptr = &(anglePtr->atom(1));
00899                   atom2Ptr = &(anglePtr->atom(2));
00900 
00901                   if (atom0Ptr != &(moleculePtr->atom(id0))) {
00902                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for an Angle");
00903                   }
00904                   if (atom1Ptr != &(moleculePtr->atom(id1))) {
00905                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for an Angle");
00906                   }
00907                   if (atom2Ptr != &(moleculePtr->atom(id2))) {
00908                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for an Angle");
00909                   }
00910                   if (anglePtr->typeId() != angleType) {
00911                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent angle type index");
00912                   }
00913 
00914                   ++anglePtr;
00915                }
00916             }
00917             #endif
00918 
00919             #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00920             if (nDihedralType_ > 0) {
00921 
00922                const Atom* tAtomPtr;
00923                int  tAtomId, dihedralType;
00924 
00925                if (&moleculePtr->dihedral(0) != dihedralPtr) {
00926                   UTIL_THROW("Error in molecule::dihedral()");
00927                }
00928 
00929                // Validate dihedrals within a molecule
00930                for (int iDihedral = 0; iDihedral < nDihedral; ++iDihedral) {
00931 
00932                   // Validate data from SpeciesDihedral
00933                   for (int tId = 0; tId < 4; ++tId) {
00934                      tAtomId =
00935                             speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).atomId(tId);
00936                      if (tId < 0 || tId >= nAtom)
00937                         UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in SpeciesDihedral");
00938 
00939                      tAtomPtr = &(dihedralPtr->atom(tId));
00940                      if (tAtomPtr != &(moleculePtr->atom(tAtomId))) {
00941                         UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent atom handle for an Dihedral");
00942                      }
00943                   }
00944                   dihedralType = 
00945                                speciesPtr->speciesDihedral(iDihedral).typeId();
00946                   if (dihedralType < 0 || dihedralType >= nDihedralType_) {
00947                      UTIL_THROW("Invalid local atom id in a SpeciesDihedral");
00948                   }
00949                   if (dihedralType != dihedralPtr->typeId()) {
00950                      UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent dihedral type index");
00951                   }
00952                   ++dihedralPtr;
00953                }
00954 
00955             }
00956             #endif
00957 
00958             ++moleculePtr;
00959          }
00960       }
00961 
00962       return true;
00963    }
00964 
00965    // Mutators / Setters
00966 
00967    /*
00968    * Return the Species factory by reference.
00969    */
00970    Factory<Species>& Simulation::speciesFactory()
00971    {
00972       assert(speciesManagerPtr_);
00973       return speciesManagerPtr_->factory();
00974    }
00975 
00976    /*
00977    * Return the Diagnostic factory by reference.
00978    */
00979    Factory<Diagnostic>& Simulation::diagnosticFactory()
00980    {
00981       assert(diagnosticManagerPtr_);
00982       return diagnosticManagerPtr_->factory();
00983    }
